item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: https://demo2wpopal.b-cdn.net/poco.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: tuananh
item.content:encoded:
Wellome!

Best burger ideas & traditions from the whole world

Make the thing Anything is Possible

Enjoy our luscious dishes wherever you want ORDER NOW

Our Quality

Chicken

Quality is our #1 ingredient. That’s why our Chicken Wings, Chicken Bites and Grilled Chicken Topping are made from chickens raised without antibiotics and fed an all vegetable-grain diet, with no animal by-products. Plus, our Bites are made with 100% chicken breast meat.

ORDER NOW

Our Quaity

Burger

Some of the world’s best cheese is made close to home! All our deliciously melty Mozzarella is made with 100% Canadian milk. We’re proud to support Canadian dairy farmers.

ORDER NOW

Our Quaity

Pizza Douch

Quality is our #1 ingredient. That’s why our Chicken Wings, Chicken Bites and Grilled Chicken Topping are made from chickens raised without antibiotics and fed an all vegetable-grain diet, with no animal by-products. Plus, our Bites are made with 100% chicken breast meat.

ORDER NOW “Forget the trendy pizza shops, This hidden spot makes the best New York-style pizza slice in naples” Stephen Tindle CEO,apple "I would be lost without restaurant. I would like to personally thank you for your outstanding product." Nina Margaret CEO,apple "I am completely blown away. I would also like to say thank you to all your staff. It's really wonderful." Clara Manager "Without food, we would have gone bankrupt by now. Thanks food! The service was excellent." John Doe Manager Always Quality

item.title: About us page
item.dc:creator: duytrinh
item.content:encoded:
Wellome!

Best burger ideas & traditions from the whole world

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam.

Mauris tempus erat laoreet turpis lobortis, eu tincidunt erat fermentum. Aliquam non tincidunt urna. Integer tincidunt nec nisl vitae ullamcorper. Proin sed ultrices erat. Contact now

Make the thing Anything is Possible

Enjoy our luscious dishes wherever you want ORDER NOW

Our Quality

Chicken

Quality is our #1 ingredient. That’s why our Chicken Wings, Chicken Bites and Grilled Chicken Topping are made from chickens raised without antibiotics and fed an all vegetable-grain diet, with no animal by-products. Plus, our Bites are made with 100% chicken breast meat.

ORDER NOW

Our Quaity

Burger

Some of the world’s best cheese is made close to home! All our deliciously melty Mozzarella is made with 100% Canadian milk. We’re proud to support Canadian dairy farmers.

ORDER NOW

Our Quaity

Pizza Douch

Quality is our #1 ingredient. That’s why our Chicken Wings, Chicken Bites and Grilled Chicken Topping are made from chickens raised without antibiotics and fed an all vegetable-grain diet, with no animal by-products. Plus, our Bites are made with 100% chicken breast meat.

ORDER NOW “Forget the trendy pizza shops, This hidden spot makes the best New York-style pizza slice in naples” Stephen Tindle CEO,apple "I would be lost without restaurant. I would like to personally thank you for your outstanding product." Nina Margaret CEO,apple "I am completely blown away. I would also like to say thank you to all your staff. It's really wonderful." Clara Manager "Without food, we would have gone bankrupt by now. Thanks food! The service was excellent." John Doe Manager Always Quality

Our Talented Chefs

Chef william smith Everything We Pizza, We Pizza With Love. Designer Fastfood.
Manager John Doe Everything We Pizza, We Pizza With Love. Designer Fastfood.
Chef Bradd L. Everything We Pizza, We Pizza With Love. Designer Fastfood.

We guarantee

30 Minutes Delivery!

If you're having a meeting, working late at night and need an extra push. Let us know and we will be there make an order

item.title: ProductInfor
item.dc:creator: nguyendiep
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

1054

energy/kcal

68

item.title: Apricot Chicken
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: Crispy bacon, tasty ham, pineapple, onion and stretchy mozzarella, finished with a BBQ swirl.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Bacon Burger
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: BBQ chicken breast
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Blueberry Shake
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Bolognese Pasta
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Cheese Butter
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

item.title: Chicken Burger
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Chocolate cake
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Chocolate Muffin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Soda Bottles
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby! Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Double Beef Burger
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Double Cheese
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Fresh Lime
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

548

My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Grand Italiano
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Hawaii Vegetarian Pizza
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: Mouth watering pepperoni, cabanossi, mushroom, capsicum, black olives and stretchy mozzarella, seasoned with garlic and oregano.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Hawaii Vegetarian Pizza
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

68

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Iced Coffee
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

728

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Iced Tea
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Iced Tea Bottle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Italiano Original

item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Lemonades Drink
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Molto Tagliatelle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Muffin Chocolate

item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Orange Juice
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Original Burger
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Pene Salmone
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

item.title: Penne Funghi Chicken
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Pepperoni Pizza
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: Extra-virgin olive oil, garlic, mozzarella cheese, onions, mushrooms, green olives, black olives, fresh tomatoes.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Pizzaro Coffee
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Red Chocolate Cake
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

728

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Red Velvet Cake
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

protein/g

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: A mighty meaty double helping of all the reasons you love our burger.

My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Stawberry Ice
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Strawberry Tea
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

728

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I am 6 feet tall and 220 lbs. This shirt fit me perfectly in the chest and shoulders. My only complaint is that it is so long! I like to wear polo shirts untucked. This shirt goes completely past my rear end. If I wore it with ordinary shorts, you probably wouldnt be able to see the shorts at all - completely hidden by the shirt. It needs to be 4 to 5 inches shorter in terms of length to suit me. I have many RL polo shirts, and this one is by far the longest. I dont understand why.

The shirt was not the fabric I believed it to be. It says Classic Fit but was made like the older versions, not the soft cotton like my others. I don’t understand how the labels are the same but a completely different shirt. Oh well, stuck with it now.
Real authentic genuine quality however it fit me like an XL size when In fact Im L. Beware

The Ralph Lauren quaility is here in abundance. My husband always says that the Lauren polos fit better and last longer than any other brand.I love the new "heathered" color and the price is always excellent through shop
My son loved this Jacket for his Senior Prom... He got sooo many compliments! He is slim build 5’11 and 150lbs ... I ordered a large ... it was a little big ... but it was fine!

item.title: Summer Pizza
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Although the legendary Double Burger really needs no introduction, please allow us… Tucked in between three soft buns are two all-beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, onion, pickles and iceberg lettuce. Hesburger’s own paprika and cucumber mayonnaise add the crowning touch. Oh baby!

Ingredients: Dr. Praeger’s Black Bean Burger, Focaccia bun, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Pesto, Tomato, Swiss Cheese

Pizza

28 cm size

Allergies

728

Energy/Kj

Egg

1054

energy/kcal

milk protein

68

fat/g

sesame

25

gluxit /g

lactose

48

sugar/g

gluten

548

mustard
item.excerpt:encoded: Shrimp, Red Capsicum, Green Capsicum, Onion, Chilli flakes, Lemon Pepper, Mozzarella, finished with Aioli
